entry.title: How an Air Purifier Can Help With Ferret Smell
entry.summary: You can find a variety of different air purifiers that will address your pet's smell problem. They come with different filters and types of materials, including charcoal, HEPA, and electrostatic. The better one you choose, the less likely you will experience ferret smell. Read on to learn more about these different types of filters. The right purifier will reduce the smell of your ferret by at least 90%.
